entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
